Google Inc. may be returning to its start-up roots. "A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation," said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co. Having someone with the very strong products background that Larry has could bring some innovation back to Google Inc. . Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain as executive chairman and will advise Page and Sergey Brin , Google Inc. 's other co-founder. Sergey Brin will give up his title as co-president to work on high-priority projects.
